channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
channel.description:
(Please read to the "comments" to see why this class could be considered "overpowered".)
----------
**Queen** (Good, Neutral, or Evil) - A very powerful matriarch with the ability to protect... or destroy.
Passive 1: **Mourning Veil** - Daytime executions recharge your "Iron Glove" ability if it is at zero.
Passive 2: **Royal Blood** - You may put your name forward to become King.
Day Ability: **Guiding Hand** - Convert the King to your alignment if his alignment is one step away from yours. A failed attempt will only tell the king someone tried to convert him, and you will not be notified that it failed. This will tell the King there is a Queen who is against him. (Single use.)
_Explanation:_
_[Blue Dragon] [Neutral] [Evil]_ _^ You can only move the King ONE step either way, to the same alignment as yourself. If you are Blue Dragon and the King is Evil, you cannot move him over because that's "two steps" away._
Night Ability 1: **Velvet Glove** - Heal all players who visit you if they are attacked. (Limited use. Four?)
Night Ability 2: **Iron Glove** - Attack all players who visit you, killing them. (Single use, but recharged with "Mourning Veil" passive.)
Lore: Married off to the King at a young age in order to create peace between lands, you barely know your husband and rarely see him. Your seclusion has allowed you to build knowledge and power among the King's most loyal subjects. You are loved and feared in equal measure for your life-saving abilities and murderous acts of vengeance.
Comments: The Queen is the most powerful piece on the chess board, so **I have created a purposefully "OP" class** that might shake the game up in fun and crazy ways. Your alignment (Good, Neutral, Evil) doesn't have to match the King's. Neither you nor the King will know the other's alignment. You do not confer with other evil players if you are evil.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
An execution is different because it is public and it requires others to Agree. Even the Kings decide fate requires enough people to vote the person up in the first place to work. And even then the Decide fate is both 1 time use and also can be used defensively.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
When you’re killed or executed, the result is the same, rendering the difference entirely cosmetic, so King is a role that can choose to kill - and is a ‘killing role’ by the standard you set forward that any role that CAN kill is a killing role. We done.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Also the king is special like the CL (who also kills).

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Its not a kill. Its an execute. There is a difference and it is enough to make it a social ability

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
So what of my point that King can decide fate and auto-kill someone? Isn’t that a killing ability?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Tormental:

Well, you have the abilities mixed up and are basing that statement on completely flipped information, so I’ll back off and let you reshuffle that and come back with a different reason.

Ah, know I see velvet glove.

Knight can guard (support) and coldsteel (killing) and is killing.

A killing ability is more likely to determine a class type then.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
Well, you have the abilities mixed up and are basing that statement on completely flipped information, so I’ll back off and let you reshuffle that and come back with a different reason.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
the queen has two main abilities.

one is one use, the other is killing.

I wonder, what should the class be?

by your logic, reaper should be social because he can silence players.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
Perhaps if the King is Cowardly King, she can choose who he votes.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
Perhaps she might even be able to block the King’s decide fate.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
Or maybe even a secret vote.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
I mean who would want to throw a sufficently more powerful class for a weaker one?

Also, the Queen should have some power over the votes.

An anonymous vote perhaps?

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
I still think Queen should be a Special Class.

But I don’t think she should become King.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
You: Queen can kill.
Me: So can King.
You: By that logic…
Me: Your logic.
You: No.

Okay.

It’s also really silly to say the Queen has two abilities “related” to killing, when one is just a passive that replenishes usage.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Luxx:

So by your logic Alchemist is a Neutral Killer then? Cause she too can kill at night.

Tormental:

Passive 1:

Mourning Veil - Daytime executions recharge your “Iron Glove” ability if it is at zero.

Tormental:

Passive 2:

Royal Blood - You may put your name forward to become King.

Tormental:

Day Ability:

Guiding Hand - Convert the King to your alignment if his alignment is one step away from yours. A failed attempt will only tell the king someone tried to convert him, and you will not be notified that it failed. This will tell the King there is a Queen who is against him. (Single use.)

Tormental:

Night Ability 2:

Iron Glove - Attack all players who visit you, killing them. (Single use, but recharged with “Mourning Veil” passive.)

2 of the four abilities are related the killing. The other 2 are royal blood and a 1 use ability

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Luxx
item.description:
RopeStringFace:

You are literally (in the game) murdering people at night as queen.

So by your logic Alchemist is a Neutral Killer then? Cause she too can kill at night.

Read full topic

Remember this is by your logic.

No it is not

You are literally (in the game) murdering people at night as queen.

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Tormental:

King’s ability to decide fate is a ‘killing special class’, though

by that logic, psychic is killing class, as they can place players on trial.

King is more social than anything. Vote/trial manipulation is social, not killing.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Queen (Special)
item.dc:creator: Tormental
item.description:
King’s ability to decide fate is a ‘killing special class’, though. (Only difference is his ability can’t be recharged with executions, of course.) Also keep in mind if no one visits you, you’re not killing anyone. XD

Read full topic

cult leader is an exception. This classes main ability is killing, while the cult leader’s is converting
